timeline.bodyText: Why did this (and other examples) need to change from @Inject to @Autowired?
timeline.author: awoods

replies.bodyText: It seems like Spring does not like resolving the @Qualifier for @Inject, at least in some circumstances.
replies.author: pwinckles
